featured.text: A standard of living is considered high when it includes __(31)__ necessities but also certain comforts and luxuries; it is considered low when food, clean water, housing, and __(32)__ necessities are limited or lacking.
One of __(34)__ measures is to calculate the percentage of income that people spend on certain necessities.
Due to _______, prices for daily necessities have gone up and we have to pay more for the same items now.
In teaching young players to cooperate with their fellows on the practice 32 , the game shows them the necessity of teamwork in society.

definition.en_def: The state or fact of being required or indispensable.
definition.example: Water is a necessity for all living beings.
